#!/bin/bash
set -x

# Define the list of resource IDs
RESOURCE_IDS=( "/subscriptions/71d39d48-511e-4706-80e5-334b4ef385d1/resourceGroups/BONDI2-DEV/providers/Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines/DEV3-TEST-VM" )

# Iterate over the list of resource IDs
for RESOURCE_ID in "${RESOURCE_IDS[@]}"; do
  echo "Deleting resource: $RESOURCE_ID"

  # Delete the resource
  az resource delete --ids "$RESOURCE_ID"

  # Check if the delete command was successful
  if [[ $? -eq 0 ]]; then
    echo "Successfully deleted resource: $RESOURCE_ID"
  else
    echo "Failed to delete resource: $RESOURCE_ID"
  fi
done

echo "Resource deletion process completed."
